comment.body:
> Hi. Cannot reproduce. What causes an issue - one of enabled filters?

Hi, sorry for the late reply but I didn't know there was a reply. But thanks to your question, I have figured out that it was the Adguard French filter that is causing this issue. Disabling just that filter and the bug doesn't occur anymore.
Thanks

comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, turn ABPVN List on, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

This domain is also used to serve image assets for MX Player's OTT platform (i.e., Online Streaming Service). It's broken now.
